Most of them are still around. I know of Kondou, Hijikata, Nagakura, and 
Saitou's descendants...the ones I know by name are Fujita Makoto (Saitou's 
descendant) and Miyagawa Toyoji (Kondou's descendant by way of his 
nephew/adopted son Yuugorou).


Hmmm... aren't the present-day Hijikatas descended from Kiroku rather than Toshizou? I did see a rumor at the forum that he'd had a kid, but that seems to be pretty unsubstantiated...

Linda/enma_o
